readable.title: 2174206711_11cb712a8d
readable.content: Two Asian cheerleaders are facing forward waving silver pom-poms , whilst other cheerleaders are performing facing the other way . Two asian cheerleaders are holding out silver pompoms . Two asian girls cheerleading for a sporting event Two girls dressed in light brown wearing black neckties hold foil pom poms while doing a routine with others . Two young girl cheerleaders wearing a khaki shirt with a black tie cheering .
